ProductComponentGroup.name: ProductComponentGroup
ProductComponentGroup.description: Represents the logical grouping of associated products in a bundle and the products’ arrangement policy (group cardinality).

Description.description: Describes the group items of a product bundle feature. For example, a group’s contents can be the associated products that accompany a main product in a bundle.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a related record or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user indirectly accessed this record (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed it.

MaxBundleComponents.description: The maximum number of associated products allowed in a group.

MinBundleComponents.description: The minimum number of associated products allowed in a group.

Name.description: Name of the product component group. Maximum length is 255 characters (of any type).

OwnerId.description: The unique identifier of the owner of this object.

ParentProductId.description: The unique identifier associated with the main product record.

Sequence.description: Determines the arrangement of the order products when configuring a bundle or set.
